name: Melting Pot (Megajam 2018)
description:
Again, not a game. Click and drag tech test, I guess? I like how the 'layers' turned out!

The plan in my head was that you'd toss stuff into the pot.. and 'colliding' things in the right zone would cause them to combine ('melt' together).

But I wasn't feeling it, so this is as far as I got :P
